label: Compile and Run C++ (PowerShell)
args: Write-Host 'Building $ZED_FILENAME ...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; g++ $ZED_FILENAME -o out.exe; if ($?) { Write-Host 'Running...' -ForegroundColor Green; ./out.exe; Write-Host ''; Write-Host '' } else { Write-Host 'Compilation Failed' -ForegroundColor Red }
